feat: AWS Production Deployment Infrastructure

Deployed complete AWS infrastructure for mentalspaceehr.com:

Infrastructure Deployed:
- Route 53: DNS hosted zone with 4 nameservers configured in GoDaddy
- ACM: SSL certificate issued and validated for mentalspaceehr.com and www subdomain
- CloudFront: CDN distribution (E3AL81URAGOXL4) for frontend delivery
- S3: Frontend static website hosting (mentalspaceehr-frontend bucket)
- ALB: Application Load Balancer with HTTPS listener and SSL termination
- ECS: Fargate cluster (mentalspace-ehr-prod) ready for backend containers
- ECR: Docker repository with backend image pushed
- Security Groups: Configured for RDS and ECS/ALB communication
- IAM: ECS task execution role created
- CloudWatch: Log groups for container monitoring

Frontend:
- Production build with API URL: https://api.mentalspaceehr.com
- Deployed to S3 and served via CloudFront
- CloudFront cache invalidated for immediate updates

Backend:
- Multi-stage Dockerfile optimized for production
- Docker image built and pushed to ECR
- ECS task definition prepared with environment variables
- Backend will deploy to: api.mentalspaceehr.com

DNS Configuration:
- mentalspaceehr.com â†’ CloudFront (frontend)
- www.mentalspaceehr.com â†’ CloudFront (frontend)  
- api.mentalspaceehr.com â†’ ALB (backend API)
- All DNS records propagated and in INSYNC status

Documentation:

- GoDaddy DNS setup instructions
- Security improvements documentation
- Pre-launch checklist
- Notification setup guide

Deployment Files:

Status: Frontend deployed and accessible. Backend deployment pending RDS database provisioning.
